StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_MIGetTermOfEnlistment]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int, @TermOfEnlistment int OUTPUT AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
SET @TermOfEnlistment = -1
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CONTRACT WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID) BEGIN SELECT @TermOfEnlistment = TERM_OF_ENLISTMENT FROM CONTRACT WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
